Gears.title: Apple MacBook Pro 2021 (14")
Gears.details: This is my personal coding computer. Processor M1 Pro Chip, 8-Core CPU, 16-Core GPU, 16 GB RAM, 512 GB SSD.

Gears.title: Keychron K2 (US layout)
Gears.details: Hot-Swap Mechanical Bluetooth Keyboard (Mac) with Keycap/Gateron Brown Switch/USB C, Compact Wireless RGB.

Gears.title: Logitech MX Master 3S For Business
Gears.details: A perfect mouse with zero lag in doing daily work with 8000 DPI sensor, customizable buttons, USB-C, Bluetooth

Gears.title: DELL S2722DC (27")
Gears.details: A perfect QHD Monitor with USB-C connectivity, I am also using it for gaming (with PS5).

Gears.title: TitanWolf Mate
Gears.details: Nice mate which compliments to my workspace.

Gears.title: IKEA height-adjustable table
Gears.details: I don't want to set for 8 hours while working, I try to stand at least a little bit each day. This desk has been great for that. I like the color of this which goes perfectly fine with other stuff on my table.

Gears.title: Quntis Monitor USB LED Lamp
Gears.details: Care about your eyes, please use a lamp on your monitor. It helps to reduce raises coming from your monitor.

Softwares.title: Night Owl
Softwares.details: Perfect theme for coding by Sarah Drasner

Softwares.title: Fire Code Fonts
Softwares.details: An open source font which makes coding simply a fun.

Softwares.title: iTerm2
Softwares.details: I started using it long time ago, because I simply hate default terminal from Mac. You can check my custom setup here

Softwares.title: Oh My ZSH!
Softwares.details: It gives perfect detailing to git repositories.

Softwares.title: Powerlevel10k
Softwares.details: Powerlevel10k is a theme for Zsh. It emphasizes speed, flexibility and out-of-the-box experience.
